title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.17 - Security standards; agents of nonpractitioners
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.17 - Security standards; agents of nonpractitioners

State Regulations

When controlled substances are distributed by nonpractitioners through agents (i.e., detailmen), the licensee is responsible for providing and requiring adequate security to guard against theft or diversion while the substances are being stored or handled by the agent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
80.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
